Curator's comments: Published: Barcelona, Toros/Bulls, p.408, Cat. No.197 Shaping the Beginning (Athens 2006), 130, cat no 3 (wrongly quoted as 67705)
Bibliographic references: Barcelona 2002 / The Bull in the Mediterranean World (cat.197, p.220)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: Exhibition: "The Bull in the Ancient World / Bulls: Image and Cult in the ancient Mediterranean", Salo del Tinell, Barcelona, 14 Nov 2002-13 Feb 2003; then Benaki Museum, Athens, 14 Nov 2002-7 Jun 2003.
